articles.title: Sheen absent from news
articles.author: Sean Penn III
articles.header: Is it only a matter of time until the next scandal is revealed??? We think yes.
paragraph_content: Charlie Sheen is still out of the news. It what has been an unprecedented occurence, Sheen has remained outside of the public eye for the summer of 2016.  Stay tuned, because this is surely the beady eye of the Sheen hurricane. We cannot even begin to guess what horror may lay accross the ether.
articles.quote: I guess maybe he's doing okay?
